description:
Vovsoft Image Combiner can combine photos, pictures and images as many as you want through a user-friendly interface.

Vovsoft Image Combiner can combine photos, pictures and images as many as you want through a user-friendly interface. You can easily create long webtoons, comics, cartoons, contact sheets or picture strips by selecting the files or folders. The application will do the rest for you. All popular formats are supported, such as JPEG, PNG, GIF, TIFF and BMP.

Through the menu, you have the option to choose a background color of your choice, including black, white, or any custom color. The alpha channel of PNG files can be maintained, ensuring the preservation of transparency and enabling the creation of transparent PNG files. Additionally, the space option allows you to add spacing between images in pixels.
